survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the experiences, challenges, and satisfaction levels of individuals working in the gig economy across various platforms.

questions.question_text: Which gig economy platforms do you currently work with?
questions.client_notes: Consider allowing multiple selections to capture workers engaged in multiple platforms.

script.question_text: Which gig economy platforms do you currently work with?

questions.question_text: On average, how many hours per week do you work on gig economy platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: On average, how many hours per week do you work on gig economy platforms?

questions.question_text: What is your primary motivation for working in the gig economy?
answer_options: Interest in the type of work
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button with optional open-ended follow-up)

script.question_text: What is your primary motivation for working in the gig economy?
answer_options: Interest in the type of work

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the earnings you receive from gig work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the earnings you receive from gig work?

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face as a gig economy worker?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture diverse challenges.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face as a gig economy worker?
